description: Astbury Park Pants by Alice McCall. These sheer check high waisted pants will become your new staple in your wardrobe! Finished with a neat waistband including belt loops, J pockets and a fly zip, these pants feature a shorts slip underneath for coverage. Tuck in the matching 'Riders Of The Storm' shirt for a night time vibe, otherwise pair with a classic T-shirt and sneakers for an everyday look.
designer: Alice McCall
name: Alice McCall Astbury Park Pants

description: Baxter Short Sleeve Boxy Crop Top by Alice and Olivia. We adore floral brocade but in this orange colour we love it even more. With hints of metallic gold this cute crop can be worn as a separate or with the matching Luisa Skirt.
designer: Launched in 2002, alice + olivia by Stacey Bendet is a sophisticated, yet eclectic brand with a playful sensibility, which epitomizes the personality and quirky style of its founder, Stacey Bendet. What started as a desire to create a perfect pair of trousers the line gradually grew to become a full lifestyle collection offering everything from party dresses and coats to embellished t-shirts and sweaters. Stacey incorporates her love of culture, music, art and vintage fashion into each collection. She is inspired by all the women around her, from her mother to her daughter to her friends, and gives something fresh and edgy to the alice + olivia girl every season. Whether she wants to look sexy or sweet, is going to the office or dressing for an evening out, Stacey instinctively knows what the a + o girl wants.
name: alice + olivia Baxter Short Sleeve Boxy Crop Top

description: Baby Blue Salad Cami and Pyjamas by Cheek Frills. We love this cute sleepwear set. Made from a baby blue modal it features loose fitting bottoms and a cami top to match. Both are trimmed with the sweetest floral lace.
designer: Cheekfrills -  the perfect knicker.  Their signature, eco-friendly modal intimates can now be found in the draws and cupboards of the coolest girls around.  Favoured by the likes of Cara Delevingne, Harley Viera-Newton, Nicky Hilton, Hanelli Mustaparta , Caroline Winberg, Poppy Delevingne and many more! More addictive than candy, from the moment these girls put on their first knicker they just keep coming back for more and more – hooked on the amazing colours and slogans but most of all because they are the most comfortable and flattering knickers you will find for your everyday.
name: Cheek Frills Baby Blue Salad Cami and Pyjamas

description: Hiltrud Shirt with Side Panels by Alexis. Push aside your collared white shirts and make way for this cool, contemporary piece. A flattering V neckline is married with bell sleeves and side panels to match.
designer: Alexis
name: Alexis Hiltrud Shirt with Side Panels

description: Check Top Ecru and Noir by Carven. Made from a soft wool this top is slightly cropped and has a collar to add to it's charming appeal. This ecru coloured collar compliments the monochrome check pattern.
designer: Since it's creation in 1945, the Carven house has had a democratic and Parisian view of fashion design. Madame Carmen de Tommaso broke through the austere world of Haute Couture as an innovator in the Forties with a spontaneous and fresh style, adapted to the women’s everyday life at that time. From the couture years, Guillaume Henry and Carven have kept its heritage. It lives on in the spirit of perfect design and choice materials. Today, the house offers ready-to-wear that is both inspired and accessible.
name: Carven Check Top Ecru and Noir

description: Helene Natural by Ancient Greek Sandals. It's never too early to get in the sunshine spirit, so why not adorn you feet with these beautifully crafted greek style sandals!
designer: According to an ancient greek myth, the gods and goddesses had their sandals made on the beautiful island of Crete by a gifted sandal maker who enriched each pair with magical powers. Famous for having made the flying sandals for Hermes, the sandal maker also embellished them with his personal signature... a ‘golden wing’ buckle. Ancient Greek Sandals are handmade in beautiful natural leather that ages beautifully with time and wear. However magical powers are not included; you can enrich them with your own!
name: Ancient Greek Sandals Helene Natural

description: Sage Dress Blossom Embroidery by Alexis. This fit and flare silhouette dress is everything we could possibly want this spring. The embroidered crochet fabric works in unison with the sheer ladder stitched waist and chevron scalloped hem to create a master-piece of a design!
designer: Mother-daughter designing duo Alexis & Ana Barbara take us around the world to their favourite fashionable hotspots. ALEXIS is a contemporary fashion brand established by mother-daughter duo, Alexis and Ana Barbara. Their exotic travels and passion for vintage has played an integral role in their design style and is reflected in their sophisticated aesthetic. With their modernism and flawless execution, the pair has successfully launched collections composed of striking silhouettes, appealing to the woman who is effortless, contemporary and utterly feminine. The duo’s inherent understanding of seductive elegance is one of the many reasons ALEXIS continually attracts women from around the world.
name: Alexis Sage Dress Blossom Embroidery

description: Lolita Dress by Again. The Lolita is a fitted floral piece with a bold red that contrasts with the striped off shoulder neckline.
designer: AGAIN is the creation of designer Amber Kekich-Purling. Kekich-Purling utilizes distinctive trends from the past that transgresses into a chic adaptation of the present. AGAIN effortlessly modernizes elements by revamping iconic shapes and transforming them into simple, wearable pieces. AGAIN gives a new meaning to edgy glamour yet the foundation of the line is timeless and classic, making it the core to one's wardrobe.
name: Again Lolita Dress

description: Henna Crochet Bra Bikini by Zimmermann. Get beach ready with this bohemian style crochet bikini! The contrasting patterns from top to bottom makes it easy to mix and match!
designer: One glance, and you know that dress or that bikini is Zimmermann. This dynamic Australian label stays true to its original vision: sophisticated femininity, strong silhouettes, clever colour combinations and delicate original prints. Elevated yet casual, with a twist of fun. There's a quintessential energy and lightness to a Zimmermann piece that you won't find elsewhere. Zimmermann swimwear's bold original prints, beautifully made maillots and sculptural bikinis create a new point of reference in flattering, sexy and stylish swimwear. As the Sydney Morning Herald so nicely puts it, "If Sydney was personified, she'd be bronzed, brazen and…wearing a Zimmermann bikini, so synonymous has the sunny label become with Australian style.
name: Zimmermann Henna Crochet Bra Bikini

description:
Starter Sneaker Black by Golden Goose Deluxe Brand. Black leather 'Starter'
sneakers from Golden Goose Deluxe Brand. These simple black leather trainers
feature a printed logo to the rear and white contrasting soles, giving it a
sporty feel.
designer: Golden Goose Deluxe Brand was created in 2000 combining the creative spirit of Francesca Rinaldo and Alessandro Gallo: two young Venetian designers, outsiders to the world of fashion. The goal of the company has always been to distinguish itself in terms of product, distribution and communication from standardized brands of the market. In less than 10 years the company has managed to create a total look that includes shirts, leather products with a "new classic” essence, the accessories collection -composed of bags, sneakers and children shoes- and capsule HAUS/GGDB collection, a sportswear lifestyle with GGDB taste, inspired by the theme of the urban design with non-apparel items such as stationery.
name: Golden Goose Starter Sneaker Black

description: Alfie II Ice Suede by Senso. The snake print sides are defined with a combo of black leather and suede. The tongue features a padded stitch detail and the rubber sole adds a sporty touch.
designer: Directional Sydney-based footwear label Senso brings forth a collection of beautifully crafted and distinctively chic shoes. Look to this cutting-edge Australian label for one-of-a-kind designs, from statement-making flatforms to towering wedges, as the label seeks to update classic styles with eye-catching shapes, treatments and silhouettes. As wearable as they are beautiful, Senso shoes are made from the finest materials, for the ultimate in stylish comfort.
name: Senso Alfie II Ice Suede

description:
Brush Stroke Bloom Dress by Clover Canyon.
With it’s bright pop of flaming colours against a monochrome backdrop, this
dress is a perfect way to transition into summer. Figure hugging and neoprene,
it’s a transeasonal wardrobe staple.
designer: Clover Canyon is created with a vibrantly modern California spirit.  With sophisticated use of color and fearless juxtaposition of print,  each seasonal collection celebrates joyful & eclectic imagination. The  fluid, modern silhouettes and graphic forms vividly evoke an  enchanting confidence.  Every collection is designed, patterned, cut & sewn "In-House". The  exclusive production process is equally as passionate and authentic;  Individually Hand Cut, working closely with local printer and sewing  groups, each garment is the result of a collaborative philosophy.  Clover Canyon reflects a long tradition and aesthetic to combine  artistic irony with uniquely wearable, streamlined form, while always  maintaining a cherished "Made In California" commitment.
name: Clover Canyon Brush Stroke Bloom Dress

description: Eat Me Ring by Bijoux De Famille. This silver ring features a 'Froot Loops' box design printed on calf leather with a crown on coloured Swarovski crystals.
designer: Parisian designer Julie Pasquet loves to play with anything that crosses her hand, endlessly transforming, ennobling and sublimating what surounds her. Her motto: offsetting materials, techniques and subject matters. She loves poking fun with adornment, to create jewellery with what is not. Her obsession with noble materials, such as leather, crystals, gold and silver leaf, is combined with her search for cutting edge techniques and her love for traditional craft. Delicately and daringly offset, her embroidered and printed creations become modern and audacious.
name: Bijoux De Famille Eat Me Ring

With sophisticated use of color and fearless juxtaposition of print,  each seasonal collection celebrates joyful & eclectic imagination. The  fluid, modern silhouettes and graphic forms vividly evoke an  enchanting confidence.  Every collection is designed, patterned, cut & sewn "In-House". The  exclusive production process is equally as passionate and authentic;  Individually Hand Cut, working closely with local printer and sewing  groups, each garment is the result of a collaborative philosophy.  Clover Canyon reflects a long tradition and aesthetic to combine  artistic irony with uniquely wearable, streamlined form, while always  maintaining a cherished "Made In California" commitment.
name: Clover Canyon Gradient Plaid Jumpsuit

description:
Dress Me Bangle by Bijoux De Famille.
Have some fun with this 6 stack bangle set. It's sure to be a talking point and
has been hand made with printed leather and gold plated bangles.
designer: Parisian designer Julie Pasquet loves to play with anything that crosses her hand, endlessly transforming, ennobling and sublimating what surounds her. Her motto: offsetting materials, techniques and subject matters. She loves poking fun with adornment, to create jewellery with what is not. Her obsession with noble materials, such as leather, crystals, gold and silver leaf, is combined with her search for cutting edge techniques and her love for traditional craft. Delicately and daringly offset, her embroidered and printed creations become modern and audacious.
name: Bijoux De Famille Dress Me Bangle

description: Alethea Print Colourful With Peter Pilotto by Ancient Greek Sandals. It's never too early to get in the sunshine spirit, so why not adorn you feet with these bold print, greek style sandals!
designer: According to an ancient greek myth, the gods and goddesses had their sandals made on the beautiful island of Crete by a gifted sandal maker who enriched each pair with magical powers. Famous for having made the flying sandals for Hermes, the sandal maker also embellished them with his personal signature... a ‘golden wing’ buckle. Ancient Greek Sandals are handmade in beautiful natural leather that ages beautifully with time and wear. However magical powers are not included; you can enrich them with your own!

description: Check Dress Ecru and Noir by Carven. We love the daytime appeal of this check dress. The collar is a charming addition and it contrasts against the cotton check.
designer: Since it's creation in 1945, the Carven house has had a democratic and Parisian view of fashion design. Madame Carmen de Tommaso broke through the austere world of Haute Couture as an innovator in the Forties with a spontaneous and fresh style, adapted to the women’s everyday life at that time. From the couture years, Guillaume Henry and Carven have kept its heritage. It lives on in the spirit of perfect design and choice materials. Today, the house offers ready-to-wear that is both inspired and accessible.
name: Carven Check Dress Ecru and Noir

Madame Carmen de Tommaso broke through the austere world of Haute Couture as an innovator in the Forties with a spontaneous and fresh style, adapted to the women’s everyday life at that time. From the couture years, Guillaume Henry and Carven have kept its heritage. It lives on in the spirit of perfect design and choice materials. Today, the house offers ready-to-wear that is both inspired and accessible.
name: Carven Robe Velours Cotele Beige

description: Alchemy Crochet Bra Bikini by Zimmermann. Get beach ready with this bohemian style crochet bikini! The contrasting patterns from top to bottom makes it easy to mix and match!
designer: One glance, and you know that dress or that bikini is Zimmermann. This dynamic Australian label stays true to its original vision: sophisticated femininity, strong silhouettes, clever colour combinations and delicate original prints. Elevated yet casual, with a twist of fun. There's a quintessential energy and lightness to a Zimmermann piece that you won't find elsewhere. Zimmermann swimwear's bold original prints, beautifully made maillots and sculptural bikinis create a new point of reference in flattering, sexy and stylish swimwear. As the Sydney Morning Herald so nicely puts it, "If Sydney was personified, she'd be bronzed, brazen and…wearing a Zimmermann bikini, so synonymous has the sunny label become with Australian style.
name: Zimmermann Alchemy Crochet Bra Bikini

description:
Emoticon Bangles by Bijoux De
Famille. This cool stack set includes 8 bracelets with printed leather on each
one. Your favourite emoji's are printed on the calf leather. Why not pair with
the matching Emoticon Choker?
designer: Parisian designer Julie Pasquet loves to play with anything that crosses her hand, endlessly transforming, ennobling and sublimating what surounds her. Her motto: offsetting materials, techniques and subject matters. She loves poking fun with adornment, to create jewellery with what is not. Her obsession with noble materials, such as leather, crystals, gold and silver leaf, is combined with her search for cutting edge techniques and her love for traditional craft. Delicately and daringly offset, her embroidered and printed creations become modern and audacious.
name: Bijoux De Famille Emoticon Bangles

description: Antigone Black by Ancient Greek Sandals. Make a statement in these beautifully crafted greek style sandals; we promise, they'll go with anything.
designer: According to an ancient greek myth, the gods and goddesses had their sandals made on the beautiful island of Crete by a gifted sandal maker who enriched each pair with magical powers. Famous for having made the flying sandals for Hermes, the sandal maker also embellished them with his personal signature... a ‘golden wing’ buckle. Ancient Greek Sandals are handmade in beautiful natural leather that ages beautifully with time and wear. However magical powers are not included; you can enrich them with your own!
name: Ancient Greek Sandals Antigone Black

description: Loran Structured Lantern Skirt by Alice and Olivia. The lantern shape of this skirt is to die for. It's cute and playful. The high waist is very flattering but the floral design is our favourite part. Pair with a plain blouse to show off its colours.
designer: Launched in 2002, alice + olivia by Stacey Bendet is a sophisticated, yet eclectic brand with a playful sensibility, which epitomizes the personality and quirky style of its founder, Stacey Bendet. What started as a desire to create a perfect pair of trousers the line gradually grew to become a full lifestyle collection offering everything from party dresses and coats to embellished t-shirts and sweaters. Stacey incorporates her love of culture, music, art and vintage fashion into each collection. She is inspired by all the women around her, from her mother to her daughter to her friends, and gives something fresh and edgy to the alice + olivia girl every season. Whether she wants to look sexy or sweet, is going to the office or dressing for an evening out, Stacey instinctively knows what the a + o girl wants.
name: alice + olivia Loran Structured Lantern Skirt

Their exotic travels and passion for vintage has played an integral role in their design style and is reflected in their sophisticated aesthetic. With their modernism and flawless execution, the pair has successfully launched collections composed of striking silhouettes, appealing to the woman who is effortless, contemporary and utterly feminine. The duo’s inherent understanding of seductive elegance is one of the many reasons ALEXIS continually attracts women from around the world.
name: Alexis Alana White Embroidered Dress

description: Darla Boatneck Bell Sleeve Dress. This beautifully designed embroidered dress takes the classic and flare to a decadent new place. Pair it with some simple black stroppy heels and gold accessories to finish the look!
designer: Launched in 2002, alice + olivia by Stacey Bendet is a sophisticated, yet eclectic brand with a playful sensibility, which epitomizes the personality and quirky style of its founder, Stacey Bendet. What started as a desire to create a perfect pair of trousers the line gradually grew to become a full lifestyle collection offering everything from party dresses and coats to embellished t-shirts and sweaters. Stacey incorporates her love of culture, music, art and vintage fashion into each collection. She is inspired by all the women around her, from her mother to her daughter to her friends, and gives something fresh and edgy to the alice + olivia girl every season. Whether she wants to look sexy or sweet, is going to the office or dressing for an evening out, Stacey instinctively knows what the a + o girl wants.
name: alice + olivia Darla Boatneck Bell Sleeve Dress

description: Robe Double Crepe Dress by Carven. Keep it simple in this elegant, powder blue design by Carven; all it needs is some statement stilettos and you're good to go!
designer: Since it's creation in 1945, the Carven house has had a democratic and Parisian view of fashion design. Madame Carmen de Tommaso broke through the austere world of Haute Couture as an innovator in the Forties with a spontaneous and fresh style, adapted to the women’s everyday life at that time. From the couture years, Guillaume Henry and Carven have kept its heritage. It lives on in the spirit of perfect design and choice materials. Today, the house offers ready-to-wear that is both inspired and accessible.
name: Carven Robe Double Crepe Dress

designer: A former ballet dancer and surfing enthusiast, Polish-born designer Marysia Dobrzanska Reeves has created a luxury swimwear brand that epitomizes poolside style. The line eschews trendy prints and typical cuts for perfectly executed silhouettes in premium fabrics. Having spent most of her life in either a ballet leotard or a wetsuit, she has created a totally modern style that’s always fresh and effortless. Marysia’s bikinis, maillots and cover-ups can be seen on the beaches of Montauk to Biarritz.

description: Nouveau Facade Dress Multi by Clover Canyon. This dress looks like its just stepped right out of an art gallery with its abstract prints and vivid brush mark design.. its silhouette may be simple, but its statement print brings it to life.
designer: Clover Canyon is created with a vibrantly modern California spirit.  With sophisticated use of color and fearless juxtaposition of print,  each seasonal collection celebrates joyful & eclectic imagination. The  fluid, modern silhouettes and graphic forms vividly evoke an  enchanting confidence.  Every collection is designed, patterned, cut & sewn "In-House". The  exclusive production process is equally as passionate and authentic;  Individually Hand Cut, working closely with local printer and sewing  groups, each garment is the result of a collaborative philosophy.  Clover Canyon reflects a long tradition and aesthetic to combine  artistic irony with uniquely wearable, streamlined form, while always  maintaining a cherished "Made In California" commitment.
name: Clover Canyon Nouveau Facade Dress Multi

The line eschews trendy prints and typical cuts for perfectly executed silhouettes in premium fabrics. Having spent most of her life in either a ballet leotard or a wetsuit, she has created a totally modern style that’s always fresh and effortless. Marysia’s bikinis, maillots and cover-ups can be seen on the beaches of Montauk to Biarritz.
name: Marysia Antibes Bikini Grey

description: Dolly Mix Hot Pink by Rogues. Crafted from a soft hot pink suede with spotted pony-style calfskin detailing, there is no denying that these brogues will be your statement buy for SS16!
designer: Rogues were born from a desire to create footwear that's not only functional, but elegant and full of character. A love-child from the colour and comfort of trainers and the craft and credentials of brogues, Rogues should have a firm place in any modern woman's wardrobe. Created from three pieces of leather to form an iconic shape, Rogues are manufactured in Portugal where generations of hand-crafted quality leather goods have been produced. The slight platform, the low cut around the ankle and the narrow fit on the toe all ensure that this is both an elegant and flattering shoe, whereas the pick'n'mix laces and wide range of colours place creativity and customisation at the heart of the label. Team all this with classic shades of leather, luxurious pony skin and signature neon laces, and you have a dynamic combination that can't fail to stand out.
name: Rogues Dolly Mix Hot Pink

Combining the clink of a glass 'salud' and the heat of the sun 'sol', Soludos was born.

description: Amal Boxy Tank by Alice and Olivia. Crafted from an embroidered fabric with a slight hint of sparkle in, this cute little boxy top by Alice and Olivia is high up on our must have list. Complete the look and get the matching shorts!
designer: Launched in 2002, alice + olivia by Stacey Bendet is a sophisticated, yet eclectic brand with a playful sensibility, which epitomizes the personality and quirky style of its founder, Stacey Bendet. What started as a desire to create a perfect pair of trousers the line gradually grew to become a full lifestyle collection offering everything from party dresses and coats to embellished t-shirts and sweaters. Stacey incorporates her love of culture, music, art and vintage fashion into each collection. She is inspired by all the women around her, from her mother to her daughter to her friends, and gives something fresh and edgy to the alice + olivia girl every season. Whether she wants to look sexy or sweet, is going to the office or dressing for an evening out, Stacey instinctively knows what the a + o girl wants.

description: Lotte High Tri Bikini by Zimmermann.
designer: One glance, and you know that dress or that bikini is Zimmermann. This dynamic Australian label stays true to its original vision: sophisticated femininity, strong silhouettes, clever colour combinations and delicate original prints. Elevated yet casual, with a twist of fun. There's a quintessential energy and lightness to a Zimmermann piece that you won't find elsewhere. Zimmermann swimwear's bold original prints, beautifully made maillots and sculptural bikinis create a new point of reference in flattering, sexy and stylish swimwear. As the Sydney Morning Herald so nicely puts it, "If Sydney was personified, she'd be bronzed, brazen and…wearing a Zimmermann bikini, so synonymous has the sunny label become with Australian style.
name: Zimmermann Lotte High Tri Bikini

description: Green Cascading Butterflies Camisole Mini Dress by Clover Canyon.
designer: Clover Canyon is created with a vibrantly modern California spirit.  With sophisticated use of color and fearless juxtaposition of print,  each seasonal collection celebrates joyful & eclectic imagination. The  fluid, modern silhouettes and graphic forms vividly evoke an  enchanting confidence.  Every collection is designed, patterned, cut & sewn "In-House". The  exclusive production process is equally as passionate and authentic;  Individually Hand Cut, working closely with local printer and sewing  groups, each garment is the result of a collaborative philosophy.  Clover Canyon reflects a long tradition and aesthetic to combine  artistic irony with uniquely wearable, streamlined form, while always  maintaining a cherished "Made In California" commitment.
name: Clover Canyon Green Cascading Butterflies Camisole Mini Dress

designer: FRAME was founded in 2012 by Jens Grede and Erik Torstensson, the two London based Swedes behind The Saturday Group, the global fashion business and INDUSTRIE magazine.  The pair wanted to create the perfect pair of jeans, by bringing together the quality and heritage of denim manufacturing in Los Angeles, with the influence of a London style, cut and fit.  FRAME is produced in Los Angeles, USA by an all star line up. From design, to wash houses and cut & sew, the best people in their field have all come together to make an unrivalled product in quality and price.

designer: Directional Sydney-based footwear label Senso brings forth a collection of beautifully crafted and distinctively chic shoes. Look to this cutting-edge Australian label for one-of-a-kind designs, from statement-making flatforms to towering wedges, as the label seeks to update classic styles with eye-catching shapes, treatments and silhouettes. As wearable as they are beautiful, Senso shoes are made from the finest materials, for the ultimate in stylish comfort.

description: Daisy Print Cashmere Linda Cardigan by Markus Lupfer. Dress up an outfit with this light cashmere cardi. It has a 'V' cut neckline with a button closure and two patch pockets.
designer: Lupfer is renowned for his humorously subversive knitwear and inspired approach to jersey daywear and tailoring. His innovative and often surreal use of print, embroidery and graphic embellishment, continues to earn him a devoted celebrity following. With fans including Madonna, Beyonce, Rhianna, Olivia Palermo, Lydia Hearst, Alexa Chung, Florence Welch, Edie Campbell, Anna Friel and Gossip Girl’s Leighton Meester and Blake Lively. The Markus Lupfer brand has evolved to include extensive day and evening wear collections.
name: Markus Lupfer Daisy Print Cashmere Linda Cardigan

description: Knit Fringe Cardigan in Connector Pink by Mara Hoffman. Add some colour to your autumn wardrobe with this boldly striped cardigan by Mara Hoffman. Trimmed with fringe, this cozy jumper will give the casual look a whole new dimension.
designer: Mara Hoffman is a New York fashion designer whose line, Mara Hoffman,  launched in 2000. Hoffman studied fashion design and graduated from  Parsons School of Design in New York City and Central Saint Martins  College of Art and Design in London. Mara Hoffman has evolved from  collections featuring hand-dyed couture pieces to her current  collections which concentrate heavily on original silk prints.  Hoffman pulls her inspiration from nature, world travel and fantasy.  Her work is shown on the runway during NY Fashion Week.
name: Mara Hoffman Knit Fringe Cardigan in Connector Pink

designer: Established in 2008 by London based designer Ollie Amhurst,  Lot 78 is a contemporary ready to wear luxury clothing brand for both men and women. Lot 78 unites the individual styling and attitude of London street wear married with world-renowned tailoring and materials from Northern Italy. The androgynous look created each season through the combination of clean uncluttered lines, quality fabrics and a muted colour palette commands an understated luxury and urban edge. Each piece is a perfect timeless wardrobe essential.
name: Lot 78 Slub 2 Tone Tee

description: Mid Rise 11 Skinny Jean Silver Fox by J Brand. This 811 skinny jean is cut from a lightweight Japanese luxe twill and features a subtly worn-in look with destruction at the knees and a released hem.
designer: J Brand set out to create classic and sophisticated jeans with an emphasis on fit, timeless products and the inspiration to make a woman look and feel beautiful in her jeans. With this mission, J Brand has achieved a winning combination of style, comfort and sexiness in denim. Bringing with him extensive knowledge of the market and over 30 years of experience in the fashion industry, Jeff Rudes, CEO, co-founded J Brand in 2004. Rudes pioneered the French jeans boom in America in the late 1970s with his first denim brand, Paris 2000. Rudes had a vision for J Brand, to create a jean that fit so perfectly it followed the contours of one's body. Remaining true and authentic to the customer while delivering inventive designs and collaborations, J Brand continues to be an industry leader and purveyor in the premium denim market.
name: J Brand 811 Mid Rise Skinny Jean Silver Fox

description:
Boyfriend Jean in Barnsley by Rag and
Bone. These washed out boyfriend jeans are 100% cotton, making them 100%
lustworthy. With the perfect worn in look, these jeans take comfort and style
to the next level.
designer: With no formal fashion training, the founders of rag & bone set about learning how to make jeans. Beginning in Kentucky, they surrounded themselves with people who had been sewing, cutting and constructing classic workwear for generations. Working with these skilled craftsmen taught Wainwright & Neville early on about the importance of quality workmanship and careful attention to detail. These principles, along with a desire to employ individuals who take great pride in their work, soon became the foundation of the rag & bone philosophy. Many of the items in the collection incorporate details or trims that go back to an earlier time when a greater appreciation was placed on fine tailoring. The same amount of emphasis is put on the inside of the garments and trims, as is taken with the outward appearance of the clothing.
name: Rag and Bone Boyfriend Jean in Barnsley

description:
8227 Mid Rise Cropped Skinny Jean Olive Camo by J Brand. Forget subtlety and get your camo on this spring. This distinctive
print is here to stay and is bound to make street style statements.
designer: J Brand set out to create classic and sophisticated jeans with an emphasis on fit, timeless products and the inspiration to make a woman look and feel beautiful in her jeans. With this mission, J Brand has achieved a winning combination of style, comfort and sexiness in denim. Bringing with him extensive knowledge of the market and over 30 years of experience in the fashion industry, Jeff Rudes, CEO, co-founded J Brand in 2004. Rudes pioneered the French jeans boom in America in the late 1970s with his first denim brand, Paris 2000. Rudes had a vision for J Brand, to create a jean that fit so perfectly it followed the contours of one's body. Remaining true and authentic to the customer while delivering inventive designs and collaborations, J Brand continues to be an industry leader and purveyor in the premium denim market.
name: J Brand 8227 Mid Rise Cropped Skinny Olive Camo

description: Empire Mini Dress French Lace by Lover. This delicate floral lace design dress is perfect for those events that require a little more sophistication. Featuring a subtle sweetheart shape neck line and sheer short sleeves, the dress certainly doesn't lack elegance.
designer: Beautiful things have a momentum all their own.  Nic Brand and Susien Chong know this - in fact, they live and breathe it. They have mixed their individual tastes, one for romantic and ethereal the other for loud and irreverent to create an influential label that has remained true to its signature style and ideals from day one.  LOVER is an ever-changing monument to defiant youth, natural wisdom and feminine charm that has gained cult like status.

designer: Established in 2008 by London based designer Ollie Amhurst,  Lot 78 is a contemporary ready to wear luxury clothing brand for both men and women. Each piece is a perfect timeless wardrobe essential.

description: Maria Flare Embrace by J Brand. Flares remain a favourite for Autumn/ Winter 15 so it's important you get a pair that fits as good as they look. Crafted in a flattering soft stretch cotton blend, they feature a complementary copper button and the traditional 5-pocket design.
designer: J Brand set out to create classic and sophisticated jeans with an emphasis on fit, timeless products and the inspiration to make a woman look and feel beautiful in her jeans. With this mission, J Brand has achieved a winning combination of style, comfort and sexiness in denim. Bringing with him extensive knowledge of the market and over 30 years of experience in the fashion industry, Jeff Rudes, CEO, co-founded J Brand in 2004. Rudes pioneered the French jeans boom in America in the late 1970s with his first denim brand, Paris 2000. Rudes had a vision for J Brand, to create a jean that fit so perfectly it followed the contours of one's body. Remaining true and authentic to the customer while delivering inventive designs and collaborations, J Brand continues to be an industry leader and purveyor in the premium denim market.
name: J Brand Maria Flare Embrace

designer: Beautiful things have a momentum all their own.  Nic Brand and Susien Chong know this - in fact, they live and breathe it. They have mixed their individual tastes, one for romantic and ethereal the other for loud and irreverent to create an influential label that has remained true to its signature style and ideals from day one.  LOVER is an ever-changing monument to defiant youth, natural wisdom and feminine charm that has gained cult like status.

designer: Established in 2008 by London based designer Ollie Amhurst,  Lot 78 is a contemporary ready to wear luxury clothing brand for both men and women. Lot 78 unites the individual styling and attitude of London street wear married with world-renowned tailoring and materials from Northern Italy. The androgynous look created each season through the combination of clean uncluttered lines, quality fabrics and a muted colour palette commands an understated luxury and urban edge. description:
Black Romper by Rag and Bone. Expect to wear this black number over and over again as it takes you
from day to night with the right accessories. With a waist tie, this romper is
relaxed and sophisticated.
designer: With no formal fashion training, the founders of rag & bone set about learning how to make jeans. Beginning in Kentucky, they surrounded themselves with people who had been sewing, cutting and constructing classic workwear for generations. Working with these skilled craftsmen taught Wainwright & Neville early on about the importance of quality workmanship and careful attention to detail. These principles, along with a desire to employ individuals who take great pride in their work, soon became the foundation of the rag & bone philosophy. Many of the items in the collection incorporate details or trims that go back to an earlier time when a greater appreciation was placed on fine tailoring. The same amount of emphasis is put on the inside of the garments and trims, as is taken with the outward appearance of the clothing.
name: Rag and Bone Black Romper

Timeless and innovative, the collection features modern, androgynous silhouettes, discreet sexiness, luxe fabrics, unexpected details and feminine riffs on men's shirting. The range of prints, fabrics and silhouette styles negotiate the many facets of the Equipment woman: she is strong, chic, elegant, adventurous, sexy and is above all, classic.
name: Equipment Lynn Shirt in Snake

description: Kate Wrap Blouse by Cooper and Ella. Gently draped for a flattering faux-wrap fit, the Alyssa features a knockout print. Pair it with some black leather skinny’s for that sophisticated evening look.
designer: Chic, unfussy, and affordable, cooper & ella was founded as an answer to every woman's need for the perfect blouse—that key to unlocking her wardrobe. She may have already splurged on new leather pants or owns the ideal jeans. Now, she needs to put her look together with the right top. Preferably one that won't break the bank. cooper & ella blouses do not define a woman, but refine her look with ease and sophistication.
name: Cooper & Ella Kate Wrap Blouse

His innovative and often surreal use of print, embroidery and graphic embellishment, continues to earn him a devoted celebrity following. With fans including Madonna, Beyonce, Rhianna, Olivia Palermo, Lydia Hearst, Alexa Chung, Florence Welch, Edie Campbell, Anna Friel and Gossip Girl’s Leighton Meester and Blake Lively. The Markus Lupfer brand has evolved to include extensive day and evening wear collections.

Lot 78 unites the individual styling and attitude of London street wear married with world-renowned tailoring and materials from Northern Italy. The androgynous look created each season through the combination of clean uncluttered lines, quality fabrics and a muted colour palette commands an understated luxury and urban edge. Each piece is a perfect timeless wardrobe essential.

description: Lucrezia Black Stiletto Heel with Lace by Giuseppe Zanotti. This simple stiletto shape is finished with a lace back that elegantly wraps around the ankle and joins with a buckled strap. These Giuseppe creations will bring sophistication and life to any outfit.
designer: Giuseppe Zanotti comes from a small town a few miles from Fellini’s Rimini, famous for its great shoe manufacturing tradition. In the early 90’s he felt the need to create models and styles without any bounds, and that is when he bought the Vicini shoe factory.  He focused everything on a formula of creativity and craftsmanship of the highest level. Giuseppe saw the shoe factory as something more akin to a fashion house set up to meet the needs of every woman’s foot, and not as an industrial concern that mass produces tedious shoes. Over the years his spirit has remained the same - naïf and rock ‘n’ roll – while keeping one eye on the past and on the manufacturing tradition and the other on the future and on research.
name: Giuseppe Zanotti Lucrezia Black Stiletto Heel with Lace

Ghita Mocassin by Rag and Bone. Worn by

designer: With no formal fashion training, the founders of rag & bone set about learning how to make jeans. Beginning in Kentucky, they surrounded themselves with people who had been sewing, cutting and constructing classic workwear for generations. Working with these skilled craftsmen taught Wainwright & Neville early on about the importance of quality workmanship and careful attention to detail. These principles, along with a desire to employ individuals who take great pride in their work, soon became the foundation of the rag & bone philosophy. Many of the items in the collection incorporate details or trims that go back to an earlier time when a greater appreciation was placed on fine tailoring. The same amount of emphasis is put on the inside of the garments and trims, as is taken with the outward appearance of the clothing.
name: Rag and Bone Ghita Mocassin

Superstar Sneakers White by Golden Goose Deluxe Brand. White leather 'Superstar' sneakers

designer: Golden Goose Deluxe Brand was created in 2000 combining the creative spirit of Francesca Rinaldo and Alessandro Gallo: two young Venetian designers, outsiders to the world of fashion. The goal of the company has always been to distinguish itself in terms of product, distribution and communication from standardized brands of the market. In less than 10 years the company has managed to create a total look that includes shirts, leather products with a "new classic” essence, the accessories collection -composed of bags, sneakers and children shoes- and capsule HAUS/GGDB collection, a sportswear lifestyle with GGDB taste, inspired by the theme of the urban design with non-apparel items such as stationery.

designer: Beautiful things have a momentum all their own.  Nic Brand and Susien Chong know this - in fact, they live and breathe it. They have mixed their individual tastes, one for romantic and ethereal the other for loud and irreverent to create an influential label that has remained true to its signature style and ideals from day one.  LOVER is an ever-changing monument to defiant youth, natural wisdom and feminine charm that has gained cult like status.
name: Lover Warrior Lace Mini Dress Ivory

description: Larkin Dress by Related. This beautifully crafted patterned dress is beyond perfect for the holiday season! Layer it with a dark coloured blouse and add some ankle strap heels for that cute winter look.
designer: Created by two generations of one family, Helen and Joanna Nicola, Related is a new contemporary brand offering stylish and wearable clothing for women.  Combining femininity with functionality and classic shapes with a hint of playfulness, the collection includes artfully inspired ready-to-wear day and evening pieces that meet the needs of today’s fashion-savvy woman.
name: Related Larkin Dress

description: Warrior Lace Mini Dress Rose by Lover. What's not to love out this dress? The rose red lace is cut in a romantic style with a high neckline, elegant cap sleeves and a scalloped hem finish. The length lets you show off your legs. Features a nude lining.
designer: Beautiful things have a momentum all their own.  Nic Brand and Susien Chong know this - in fact, they live and breathe it. name: Lover Warrior Lace Mini Dress Rose

description: Side Slit Corset Gown Marine by Mason by Michelle Mason. Make a subtly sexy entrance with this side slit dress. The fitted bodice is boned and features a textured detail. It features a hidden back zip.
designer: Mason was launched in 2002 as a diffusion from designer Michelle Mason's eponymous label. Mason is a youthful collection of playful garments inspired by modern shapes and classic attire. The collection successfully melds sexy urban chic and feminine edgy sophistication to create a line of designs that become the modern woman's wardrobe essentials.
name: Mason Side Slit Corset Gown Marine

description:
Pullover Multi by Sea NY. Add to your
knit collection and stay
snug in this cosy mixed jumper. Statement in both colour and blended print,
this lends itself to a classic white shirt. Brighten your winter wardrobe to
fight the winter blues.
designer: Sea, New York, designed by Monica Paolini and Sean Monahan, is an accessible line of modern, feminine dresses and separates with a flirtatious twist cut in an optimistic, modestly provocative style.
name: Sea NY Pullover Multi

description: Ponte Swing Dress Rainbow Palm by Mara Hoffman. Swing dresses are a girls best friend in summer - they're flattering and will keep you cool. The Rainbow Palm print is a firework of colours and we love the mini length of this piece.
designer: Mara Hoffman is a New York fashion designer whose line, Mara Hoffman,  launched in 2000. Hoffman studied fashion design and graduated from  Parsons School of Design in New York City and Central Saint Martins  College of Art and Design in London. Mara Hoffman has evolved from  collections featuring hand-dyed couture pieces to her current  collections which concentrate heavily on original silk prints.  Hoffman pulls her inspiration from nature, world travel and fantasy.  Her work is shown on the runway during NY Fashion Week.
name: Mara Hoffman Ponte Swing Dress Rainbow Palm

description:
Long Sleeve Shirt Dress by Sea NY. The shirtdress

designer: Sea, New York, designed by Monica Paolini and Sean Monahan, is an accessible line of modern, feminine dresses and separates with a flirtatious twist cut in an optimistic, modestly provocative style.

description: Leah Fringe Dress by Cooper and Ella. This little black dress is an essential to any wardrobe.  Its fringed sides add movement and texture.
designer: Chic, unfussy, and affordable, cooper & ella was founded as an answer to every woman's need for the perfect blouse—that key to unlocking her wardrobe. She may have already splurged on new leather pants or owns the ideal jeans. Now, she needs to put her look together with the right top. Preferably one that won't break the bank. cooper & ella blouses do not define a woman, but refine her look with ease and sophistication.
name: Cooper & Ella Leah Fringe Dress

description: Flynn Dress in Peacoat Wailea Floral Print by Equipment. Take this dress out and show off its paradise inspired print. Exotic plants add a cool splash of colour on the peacoat silk. The Flynn is a modern shirt dress with capped sleeves and a curved hem.
designer: Serge Azria, a visionary and well known name in the industry has re-launched the illustrious brand 'Equipment' which in the 1970's under Christian Restoin revolutionised fashion by introducing men's shirts into women's wardrobes - transforming a men's classic into an item of women's clothing with glam appeal. The new collection recalls the classic, minimalistic undertones of the Equipment brand, fusing unparalleled French sophistication with an air of effortlessly chic, laid-back, California style. Timeless and innovative, the collection features modern, androgynous silhouettes, discreet sexiness, luxe fabrics, unexpected details and feminine riffs on men's shirting. The range of prints, fabrics and silhouette styles negotiate the many facets of the Equipment woman: she is strong, chic, elegant, adventurous, sexy and is above all, classic.
name: Equipment Flynn Dress in Peacoat Wailea Floral Print

designer: Sea, New York, designed by Monica Paolini and Sean Monahan, is an accessible line of modern, feminine dresses and separates with a flirtatious twist cut in an optimistic, modestly provocative style.
